capabilities.name: readFile
capabilities.description: Read a file from the filesystem

capabilities.name: deleteFile
capabilities.description: Delete a file from the filesystem

capabilities.name: moveFile
capabilities.description: Move a file to a new location

capabilities.name: copyFile
capabilities.description: Copy a file to a new location

capabilities.name: updateFileDescription
capabilities.description: Update the description metadata for a file

capabilities.name: moveDirectory
capabilities.description: Move a directory to a new location

capabilities.name: copyDirectory
capabilities.description: Copy a directory to a new location

capabilities.name: listCommands
capabilities.description: List all available commands with brief descriptions

capabilities.name: getCommandHelp
capabilities.description: Get detailed help for a specific command
